pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a wide-angle, time-lapse video of the magnificent Siena Cathedral in Italy. The camera pulls back to reveal the full, ornate Gothic facade and the adjacent striped bell tower against a bright blue sky. The time-lapse effect causes the clouds and people in the piazza to move quickly across the frame.
